playSoundRepeatedlyUntilAlarmStopped: Play the sound repeatedly until the alarm is stopped
setSpecificVolumeForThisAlarm: Set a specific volume for this alarm
reportBugOrFeature: Report a bug or ask for a feature
privacyDescription: No data is collected. Everything absolutely stays on your device. No back-end. 100% offline.
builtWithLove: Built with ❤️ by Gautier de Lataillade
hapticFeedbackDescription: Light vibration when tapping on buttons
